functions module¶

This module contains classes for functions which the MLP can learn.

class mlp_smt_closed.mlp.functions.LinearA¶

Bases: object

Class for the linear function \(f: \in \mathbb{R} \rightarrow \mathbb{R}, f(x) = x-2\)

static f(x)¶
name = 'LinearA'¶
class mlp_smt_closed.mlp.functions.LinearA2D¶

Bases: object

Class for the linear function \(f: \in \mathbb{R}^2 \rightarrow \mathbb{R}^2, f(x) = \begin{bmatrix} -0.1 & -1.0 \\ 1.0 & -0.1 \end{bmatrix} \cdot x\)

static f(x)¶
name = 'Linear2DA'¶
class mlp_smt_closed.mlp.functions.QuadraticA¶
